body_html:
These commands guide you to install with MKL https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source
Currently on master there is a small bug that was introduced last week where MKL detection is not working properly, I am fixing it.

body:
These commands guide you to install with MKL https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source
Currently on master there is a small bug that was introduced last week where MKL detection is not working properly, I am fixing it.
